纅字的基本解释

纅
yào
丝的色泽。

纅
lì
治丝。

纅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yào］
［《廣韻》以灼切，入藥，以。］
丝色鲜亮。
[②]［lì］
［《集韻》狼狄切，入錫，來。］
治丝。

纅字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　纅； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页942第26
【廣韻】以灼切【集韻】弋灼切，?音藥。【說文】色絲也。　又【集韻】式灼切，音鑠。義同。　又【集韻】狼狄切，音歷。治絲也。　【篇海】或作?。

纅字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
纅字的起名意思

暂无。

纅
Basic explanation of words
纅
yào
The color of silk.
纅
lì
Rule silk.
纅
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yào］
["Guang Yun" is used as medicine, with scorching cut, with. ]
The silk color is bright.
[②]［lì］
["Ji Yun" Lang Di cut, enter the tin, come. ]
Rule silk.
纅
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　纅; Kangxi strokes: 21; Page number: page 942 26
[Guang Yun] Zhuo cut [Ji Yun] Yi Zhuo cut, sound medicine. [Said the text] Sesi also.　[Jiyun] style burnt and cut, sound. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Wolf Diqie, sound calendar. Zhisi also.　【Pianhai】Or make?.
